2.stage: Search the tubes by barcode and then search their corresponding order. Assign a batch to the tubes in the orders. Once the batch has been assigned, the tube gets the role binding.

steps.description: Find the order by tube uuid and role
Find the order by tube uuid and role
10 - Assign the batch uuid to the tubes in the order items
13 - Add the role binding_tube_to_be_extracted_nap and start it
14 - Change the status of binding_tube_to_be_extracted_nap to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted_nap to unused.
Find the order by tube uuid and role
Assign the batch uuid to the tubes in the order items
Add the tube_to_be_extracted_nap under the role binding_tube_to_be_extracted_nap and start them.
Change the status of binding_tube_to_be_extracted_nap to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted_nap to unused.
Create the search order by batch
Change the status of the order to pending
Change the status of the order to in_progress
Change the status of the order to pending
Change the status of the order to in_progress

6.stage: [Order 1] Create binding_spin_columns_dna spin columns. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna and by_product_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of the binding_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of the by_product_tube to done. Change the status of the tube_to_be_extracted to unused

7.stage: [Order 2] Create binding_spin_columns_dna spin columns. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna and by_product_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of the binding_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of the by_product_tube to done. Change the status of the tube_to_be_extracted to unused

8.stage: [Order 1] Transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the extracted_dna_tube in the order and start them
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_dna to unused

9.stage: [Order 2] Transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the extracted_dna_tube in the order and start them
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_dna to unused

10.stage: [Order 1] Create new tube_to_be_extracted tube. Transfer from by_product_tube into tube_to_be_extracted.

steps.description: Add tube_to_be_extracted tubes in the order and start them.
Transfer from by_product_tube tubes into tube_to_be_extracted tubes
Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to done

11.stage: [Order 2] Create new tube_to_be_extracted tube. Transfer from by_product_tube into tube_to_be_extracted.

steps.description: Add tube_to_be_extracted tubes in the order and start them.
Transfer from by_product_tube tubes into tube_to_be_extracted tubes
Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to done

12.stage: [Order 1] Create binding_spin_column_rna spins. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfer tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_rna and into by_product_tube.

steps.description: Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_rna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of binding_spin_column_rna to done. Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to unused

13.stage: [Order 2] Create binding_spin_column_rna spins. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfer tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_rna and into by_product_tube.

steps.description: Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_rna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of binding_spin_column_rna to done. Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to unused

14.stage: [Order 1] Transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the extracted_rna_tube in the order and start them
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_rna to unused

15.stage: [Order 2] Transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the extracted_rna_tube in the order and start them
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_rna to unused
